casebody.data:
Orla RUBSAMEN, Individually, et al., Plaintiffs, v. CARL H. SCHULTZ, a Corporation, . Defendant; Orla Rubsamen, Individually, etc., Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 1, 1926.) No. 388. Ward V. Tobert (David Steekler, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Michael M. Helfgott, of New York City, for intervener appellee. Joseph D. Fackenthal, of New York City, for purchaser at sale.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Ordered that, except as to the proceeds of the sales of real estate situated without the Southern district of New York, the decree be affirmed. The method of *1019modifying the decree in accordance with this direction is left to the lower court. No costs of this court are allowed.
